title: Jive Software To Present At The Citi Global Technology Conference
text: Jive Software To Present At The Citi Global Technology Conference   Published on 2015-09-01 13:18:20 Jive Software To Present At The Citi Global Technology Conference -- PALO ALTO, Calif.  @jivesoftware ~ working better together. @jivesoftware ~ working better together.  ><- stripped tags -> PALO ALTO, Calif.   [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTkzZDNjdWFtbDJaWE52Wm5SM1lYSmxMbU52YlM5Y0lpQnlaV3c5WENKdWIyWnZiR3h2ZDF3aUlIUmhjbWRsZEQxY0lsOWliR0Z1YTF3aVBrcHBkbVVnVTI5bWRIZGhjbVVzSUVsdVl5NDhMMkUrfA==]] (Nasdaq: [[]]), the world's leading provider of modern communication and collaboration solutions for business, today announced that Bryan LeBlanc , chief financial officer, will present at: The Citi Global Technology Conference to be held at The Hilton New York Hotel in New York City on Tuesday, September 8, 2015 , at 1:15 p.m. ET . An audio webcast of the presentation, as well as the replay, will be available on the Investor Relations section of Jive's website at [[UEdFZ2NtVnNQVndpYm05bWIyeHNiM2RjSWlCdmJtTnNhV05yUFNkc2FXNXJUMjVEYkdsamF5aDBhR2x6S1NjZ2FISmxaajFjSW1oMGRIQTZMeTlwYm5abGMzUnZjbk11YW1sMlpYTnZablIzWVhKbExtTnZiUzljSWlCeVpXdzlYQ0p1YjJadmJHeHZkMXdpSUhSaGNtZGxkRDFjSWw5aWJHRnVhMXdpUG1oMGRIQTZMeTlwYm5abGMzUnZjbk11YW1sMlpYTnZablIzWVhKbExtTnZiUzg4TDJFK3w=]]. About Jive Software Jive (Nasdaq: JIVE ) is the leading provider of modern communication and collaboration solutions for business. Recognized as a leader by the industry's top analyst firms in multiple categories, Jive enables employees, partners and customers to work better together. More information can be found at www.jivesoftware.com or the Jive News Blog .
